'''Beta 1.20.0.24''' (Android) or '''Preview 1.20.0.24''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the fifth beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.0]], released on May 11, 2023<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/15681221880589|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.20.0.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=May 11, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Achievements]]'''
* Added a new achievement:
** Smithing with Style
*** Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Seed Templates]]'''
* Updated the seed templates with a Cherry Grove biome option.

'''User Interface'''
*The main menu background in now tilted downwards on all platforms.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.20.0.24 Preview
|;old
|170184|Trade Tables no longer support custom entity Spawn Eggs.
|;From the 1.20.0 development versions
|169604|Pitcher Plants and Sniffer Eggs do not support HD resolution textures.
|169733|No sound when Sniffers lay eggs after breeding with Torchflower seeds.
|169748|Trimmed armors in the toolbar are not rendered correctly on custom texture packs with higher resolution.
|170021|Game crashes when fishing rod breaks
|170070|Teleporting players to unloaded chunks while flying causes the fly mode to get disabled
|170275|Pigs do not spawn naturally in most biomes
}}
'''Other'''
* Game no longer crashes when an item starts/stops being used if the item is not available</onlyinclude>
